mapper.select: select symbol, stock_name, chg, last_trade from stock_info where symbol = #{symbol} order by stock_date DESC limit 0, 1
select count(1) from user_stock_buy where symbol = #{symbol}
mapper.insert: insert into user_stock_follow(user_id, symbol) values(#{userId}, #{symbol}) on duplicate key update status = 1
mapper.select: select symbol from user_stock_follow where symbol = #{symbol} and user_id = #{userId} and status = 1
mapper.update: update user_stock_follow set status = 0 where user_id = #{userId} and symbol = #{symbol}
mapper.select: SELECT info.stock_name, info.last_trade, info.chg, info.volume, info.turnover, info.turnover_rate, info.swing, info.qrr, info.the_committee, info.peratio, info.stock_change FROM stock_info info LEFT JOIN user_stock_follow fo ON info.symbol = fo.symbol WHERE fo.status = 1 AND fo.user_id = #{userId} AND info.stock_date = (select max(stock_date) from stock_info) ORDER BY info.stock_name

SELECT info.stock_name, info.last_trade, info.chg, info.volume, info.turnover, info.turnover_rate, info.swing, info.qrr, info.the_committee, info.peratio, info.stock_change, buy.count, buy.count * info.last_trade amount FROM stock_info info LEFT JOIN user_stock_buy buy ON info.symbol = buy.symbol WHERE buy.user_id = #{userId} AND info.stock_date = ( SELECT max(stock_date) FROM stock_info ) ORDER BY info.stock_name
mapper.insert: insert into trade_out(user_id, symbol, count, selling_amount) values(#{userId}, #{symbol}, #{stockNum}, #{lastTrade})
insert into trade_in(user_id, symbol, count, buy_amount) values(#{userId}, #{symbol}, #{stockNum}, #{lastTrade})
